ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Master Yael and Nortlav the Scale Keeper - how do y ou do 'em?
ygData.msgSnippet: I can confirm, he can drop multiple red scales and green scales (though I haven t seen green in multiple). ... From: James Schuldes  Reply-To:
ygData.messageBody:
I can confirm, he can drop multiple red scales and green scales (though I haven't seen green in multiple).


---------- Original Message ----------------------------------
From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>
Reply-To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Date: Tue, 31 Jul 2001 10:06:40 -0500

Thanks for the tips (other posters).

I think he drops red and sometimes green scales.

Syl

From: Nygaardr, FC3 [mailto:nygaardr@...]

Mu
